Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The key activities provided are: OR: Order Received MS: Material Sourcing QS: Quality Screening AS: Assembly IQC: In-line Quality Check repeated if needed TST: Testing RT: Re-Testing PK: Packaging LB: Labeling may be skipped DP: Distribution Planning D: Dispatch

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Lets look at the sequence of activities for each case to identify patterns loops choices and concurrency. Case 1: OR MS QS AS IQC AS TST RT TST PK LB DP D. Case 2: OR MS QS AS IQC AS TST PK DP D. Case 3: OR MS QS AS IQC IQC AS IQC AS TST RT TST PK LB DP D. Case 4: OR MS QS AS TST PK LB DP D. Case 5: OR MS QS AS IQC AS IQC AS TST RT TST RT TST PK LB DP D.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Pattern for AS IQC: AS IQC AS in Case 1. AS IQC IQC AS IQC AS in Case 3. AS IQC AS IQC AS in Case 5. Case 4: single AS. IQC repeated if needed.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Hypothesis: Loop_ASM = AS then IQC loop. Loop_IQC = *(IQC SilentTransition). Loop_ASM = *(AS Loop_IQC).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Verification: For Case 4: AS exit loop. Matches. Case 1: AS IQC AS. Matches A B A. Case 3: AS IQC IQC AS IQC AS. Matches with inner loop IQC IQC then IQC.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: For TST RT: Case 2 4: TST. Case 1 3: TST RT TST. Case 5: TST RT TST RT TST. Matches *(TST RT).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: All cases start OR MS QS then Loop_ASM then Loop_TST then PK optional LB DP D. Sequential no concurrency.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Self-Correction Verification for loops matches all traces. Double check AS IQC logic fits all cases. Occams razor loop model preferred.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Top level StrictPartialOrder nodes OR MS QS loop_asm loop_tst PK xor_lb DP D with edges OR-MS MS-QS QS-loop_asm loop_asm-loop_tst loop_tst-PK PK-xor_lb xor_lb-DP DP-D.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Final check Case 3 5 traces match exactly. Structure solid.
